DefaultVisualizerLoadingRange: Value used by debug visualizer when grid loading range is chosen.
TargetBehavior: When TargetGrids or TargetHLODLayers are specified, this indicates the behavior.
TargetGrids: Optional target grids affected by streaming source.
Shapes: Optional aggregated shape list used to build a custom shape for the streaming source. When empty, fallbacks sphere shape with a radius equal to grid's loading range.
bStreamingSourceEnabled: Whether this component is enabled or not

methods.name: IsStreamingCompleted
methods.doc: Returns true if streaming is completed for this streaming source component.

methods.name: IsStreamingSourceEnabled
methods.doc: Returns true if the component is active.
